name: ABIT
effect: Words of prayer that remove 1 debuff from 1 ally row.
details: Resistance up incrementally added based on skill level and increased number of debuffs removed. Increased Resistance and area of Effects.

name: Advice of the Skull
effect: Increases damage against undead and decreases damage from undead.

name: Agent of Heresy
effect: Increases damage to enemies for everyone in a row if it has only evil or neutral allies.

name: Air Formation
effect: Increases damage to earth type enemies for user and adjacent air type allies if there are at least 2 air type allies adjacent to the user.

name: Air-Kin Blessing
effect: Reduces air type damage for beastfolk in the same row.

name: Air Type Thaumaturgy
effect: Reduces air-type damage to self.
details: Damage decreased further based on skill level.

name: Albano's Revulsion
effect: Continuously increases Defense Power and Paralysis Tolerance.
details: Defense Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

name: All Cover
effect: Chance to beat single-target attacks in place of all allies for 1 turn.
details: Defense Power Up incrementally added based on skill level. Probability and Defense Power increased further. More turns added.

name: Amnesiac Corpse Retriever
effect: Continuously increases each stat, with Attack Power, Magic Power, SP, and MP increased further.
details: Attack Power, Magic Power, SP, and MP further increased based on skill level.

name: Apothecary's Knowledge
effect: Continuously increases each stat, HP and Poison Tolerance increased further.
details: HP and Poison Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

name: Armor Break
effect: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Chance to decrease Defense Power based on the user's Dexterity.
details: Probability increased while Defense Power further decreased based on skill level.

name: Armor Pierce
effect: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Greatly penetrates Defense Power.
details: Efficacy increased while Defense Power further bypassed based on skill level.

name: Art of Assassination
effect: Chance of Critical occurring during normal attacks. Occurrence rate increased when bare-handed.
details: Critical occurrence rate increased based on skill level.

name: Assault Guard
effect: Greatly increases Defense Power during ambushes for 2 turns.
details: Defense Power incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

name: Astral Break
effect: Major earth type physical attack on 1 enemy. Bypasses Defense Power and increases Action Speed of user and allies in front or behind of 3 turns. Efficacy, Defense Power bypass rate, and Action Speed effect turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Arboris.
details: Efficacy increase and Action Speed increase effect turns incrementally increased based on skill level.

name: Attract Hit
effect: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. User becomes more easily targeted by the affected enemy for 3 turns
details: Efficacy increased and user becomes more easily targeted by enemies, based on skill level.

name: BADI
effect: Chance of dealing HP-scaled damage to 1 enemy of a race that bleeds.
details: Probability and damage scaling increased based on skill level.

name: BADIOS
effect: A light attack spell cast by a sacred prayer. Deals minor damage to 1 enemy based on the user's Divine Power. Damage is increased against undead.
details: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

name: BALAFEOS
effect: Intrudes on psyches over a wide area with a chance to reduce the Attack Power of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
details: Probability increased while Attack Power decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

name: BATILGREF
effect: Generates a bog underfoot over a wide area with a high chance of reducing the Evasion and Action Speed of 1 enemy row for 3 turns.
details: Probability increased while Evasion and Action Speed decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

name: Beastfolk Thief Discipline
effect: Continuously increases each stat. Accuracy increased further.
details: Accuracy increased further based on skill level.

name: Behind Cover
effect: Chance to bear single-target attacks in place of allies in the back.
details: Physical damage reduction incrementally added based on skill level. Chance increased further and damage decreased further.

name: Blessing of Agora
effect: Adds 1 consecutive turn to buffs and debuffs applied by the user and increases MP. MP increase amount and growth amount of consecutive turns are reduced if learned by someone other than Alice.
details: Incrementally adds MP Up based on skill level. MP increased further and number of continuous turns augmented.

name: Blessing of the Beast God
effect: Continuously increases each stat, Attack Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further.
details: Attack Power and Paralysis Tolerance increased further based on skill level.

name: Blessing of the Beastfolk Goddess
effect: Defeating an enemy restores minor SP to self. Recovery amount is reduced if learned by someone other than Debra.
details: Incrementally adds Attack Power Up based on skill level. Attack further increased and recovery amount augmented.

name: Blinding
effect: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy based on the user's Dexterity. Chance to decrease Accuracy.
details: Efficacy and probability increased while Accuracy further decreased based on skill level.

name: Blood Edge
effect: Launches a minor physical attack on 1 enemy dealing continuous damage to HP for a set number of turns.
details: Damage amount and number of turns increased further based on skill level.

name: Bloodline of the Mirror-Mere
effect: Continuously increases each stat, with Accuracy and Magic Defense increased even further.
details: Accuracy and Magic Defense increased further based on skill level.

name: Branded Hands
effect: Increases Accuracy when equipped with a two-handed weapon.

name: CALDIA
effect: Expanded visibility increases the Accuracy and Surety Rate of 1 ally for 3 turns.
details: Accuracy and Surety rate incrementally increased further based on skill level. More turns added.

name: Child of the Sacred Tree
effect: Continuously increases each stat, with Magic Power and Action Speed increased even further.
details: Magic Power and Action Speed increased further based on skill level.

name: Chris's Friendship
effect: Continuously increases MP.
details: MP increased further based on skill level.

name: Coin of Power
effect: Allows one-handed swords and two-handed swords to be equipped. Continuously increases own Attack Power, Defense Power, Accuracy, Evasion, HP, and SP.

effect: Continuously increases each stat, Surety and Sleep Tolerance increased further.

name: Compassionate Apothecary
effect: Increases Tolerance of Poison, Paralysis, and Stone for user and all adjacent good allies.

name: Concealment
effect: Conceals the user, providing a high chance of evading an enemy attack, apart from an enemy attack's standard hit determination. Evasion occurrence rate further increased while wearing no armor.

name: CONES
effect: Launches an orb of pure magic power that deals minor untyped spell damage to 1 enemy.
details: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

name: CORTU

details: Spell damage incrementally decreased further based on skill level. More turns added.

name: Counterattack
effect: Chance to counter attack when evading a close-range attack (affected by luck).
details: Probability increased based on skill level.

name: Cover
effect: Chance to intercept single-target attacks directed at 1 designated ally for 2 turns.
details: Defense Power Up incrementally added based on skill level. Probability and Defense Power increased further. More turns added.

name: Covert Strike
effect: A series of moderate physical attacks with double the Attack Rate on 1 enemy, that can only be used while in Concealment.
details: Efficacy increased based on skill level.

name: Crafty Old Mage
effect: Continuously increases each stat, Magic Defense and Magic Power increased further.
details: Magic Defense and Magic Power increased further based on skill level.

name: Cunning Pursuit

details: Recovery amount augmented, Defense Power increased, and user becomes more easily targeted by enemies, based on skill level.

name: Delay Attack
effect: Minor physical attack on 1 enemy. Chance to decrease Action Speed based on the user's Dexterity.
details: Efficacy and probability increased while Action Speed further decreased based on skill level.

name: DIADOR

effect: Words of prayer that cure 1 ally of Sleep or Stun.

name: DILTO

details: Probability increased while Accuracy decreased incrementally based on skill level. More turns added.

name: DIOS
effect: Words of blessing that restore minor HP to 1 ally.
details: Recovery amount increased based on skill level.

name: Dissipation
effect: Making the hand sign to dispel mist negates 1 multi-turn buff from 1 enemy.
details: Area of effect varies incrementally based on level. Increases the number of buffs negated.

name: Donato's Recalcitrance
effect: Continuously increases Accuracy.
details: Accuracy increased further based on skill level.

name: Dream of the Sleeping Witch
effect: Due to the strain of shared perception with the Sacred Tree, at turn end, if MP is 25% or lower, the user falls Asleep during battle for 1 ime only. While Asleep, damage taken is not increased, and MP is recovered at turn end. While Asleep, the user automatically uses a dark-type spell attack on one enemy.

name: Dwarf Knight Discipline
effect: Continuously increases each stat, HP increased further.
details: HP increased further based on skill level.

name: Earth Formation
effect: Increases damage to water type enemies for user and adjacent earth type allies if there are at least 2 earth type allies adjacent to the user.

details: Efficacy increased based on skill level and Accuracy increased further when equipped with a two-handed blunt weapon.

name: Eye of Kalshum
effect: Continuously increases Detect with a chance to nullify an enemy's ambush. Detect increase amount and chance of ambush nullification are reduced if learned by someone other than Yekaterina.

effect: By glimpsing the future, the user can act against a dangerous situation. Chance to evade or reduce the first received damage higher than 50% of own max HP. Activation rate greatly reduced if learned by anyone other than Shelirionach.

effect: Continuously increases each stat, HP and Disarm Trap increased further.
